title: 233. Jeremy Lachlan: Jane Doe
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary:
Jeremy Lachlan was born and raised in Griffith, country NSW, Australia. He completed his Honours degree in creative writing at the University of Canberra in 2004, and now calls Sydney home. 

His debut novel, Jane Doe and the Cradle of All Worlds, was the 2019 Australian Book Industry Award winner for Book of the Year for Older Children, and he once took home $100 in a karaoke competition, of which he's equally proud. 

He came up with the idea for the Jane Doe Chronicles while lost in the Cairo Museum. Book two, The Key of All Souls.

description:
Jeremy Lachlan was born and raised in Griffith, country NSW, Australia. He completed his Honours degree in creative writing at the University of Canberra in 2004, and now calls Sydney home. 

His debut novel, Jane Doe and the Cradle of All Worlds, was the 2019 Australian Book Industry Award winner for Book of the Year for Older Children, and he once took home $100 in a karaoke competition, of which he's equally proud. 

He came up with the idea for the Jane Doe Chronicles while lost in the Cairo Museum. Book two, The Key of All Souls.
